analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol:
	Contract DRPUTokenConverter has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenRetriever.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#303-315) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(msg.sender,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#314)

TokenChanger.convert (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#743-771) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenRight.issue(_sender,amountToIssue - calculateFee(amountToIssue)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#753-754)
	-tokenLeft.burn(this,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#755-756)
	-tokenLeft.issue(_sender,amountToIssue - calculateFee(amountToIssue)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#761-765)
	-tokenRight.burn(this,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#769)

DRPUTokenConverter.requestConversion (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#864-874) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-drpToken.transferFrom(sender,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_account' of Ownership.isOwner (/unique_chucks/7/0xee2972a6177c28f3efacb1862a1a8507c3f10faa.sol#67) is not in mixedCase
